COMMENT_OBS: The regions of Hiiran Bay Bakool and Middle Juba are fully excluded due to the prevailing security situation. Other exclusions include isolated areas along the Somaliland/Puntland border in Sanaag Sool and Toghdeer as well as parts of Bari region due to criminal activity there. In South Central Somalia parts of Gedo and Muduq provinces were excluded due to Al-Shabab insurgent movements. Excluded areas represent approximately 32% of the population.
